#summary A summary of new features planned for future versions of AOR-JavaSim

= New Features in 0.8 =

  * Introduce a special empty subelement 'ON-EACH-SIMULATIONSTEP' of !EnvironmentRule, as an alternative to 'WHEN',  for rules that are executed at each step
  * The SimulationScenario/@version attribute will be mandatory and fixed to the schema version
  * The schema reference provided by xsi:schemaLocation will be used, if it refers to an existing AORSL file with correct version; otherwise the schema specified in the properties file will be used


= New Features planned for the future =

  * It should be possible to select among a set of supported schemas
  * Provide one or more shrinked schemas for basic discrete event simulation without agents
  * Provide an "extended schema" in addition to the standard schema. This extended schema will, for instance, include certain predefined agent types such as '!TrustfulAndSincereAgent'
  * Integrate the expression language AORSEL
